title: Taking a Break at ○○ Cafe
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Maki-san, Maki-san. Looks like you can give treats to the cats here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Really? I’d like to try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, Maki-san, there’s an orange tabby next to you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh? Umm, wait.... What should I do? It fell asleep on my lap.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu. It seems to really like your lap, Maki-san. How about we give the snacks a bit later? Let’s let it sleep in peace.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>There’s a calico one and a white one on your side, Shioriko.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Fufu, they will also feel tense if you freeze up like that. Why don’t you play with them with this catnip?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-, I’ll try. I played with Hanpen back in Nijigaku, so I’ve got plenty of practice.... There, there, come on, over here~. Huh? The calico one has been tapping at my hand instead of the catnip....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....What a smart one. We can’t let them beat us, Shioriko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
